ThingDef.label: Wall Whithered
ThingDef.description: Whithered flesh. Connect to a heart to restore its vitality

ThingDef.label: whithered unpowered wall
ThingDef.description: Whithered wall. Connect to a well fed ShipHeart to revitalize

ThingDef.Name: WhitheredCorner
ThingDef.description: Whithered flesh. Connect to a well fed heart to revitalize

ThingDef.label: Whithered floor
ThingDef.description: Fleshy floors

ThingDef.label: bioship sphintcer Whithered
ThingDef.description: Whithered to grow a sphincter.

ThingDef.label: small bioengine Whithered
ThingDef.description: A chemfuel-powered organic engine capable of launching a ship into orbit. Not suitable for interplanetary travel.

ThingDef.label: whithered rcs bioengine
ThingDef.description: A small thruster that is required to reposition ships. One is required for every 2000 weight.

ThingDef.label: medium engine Whithered
ThingDef.description: A chemfuel-powered engine capable of launching a ship into orbit. Not suitable for interplanetary travel.\n\nIn combat, provides double the speed of smaller engines at the cost of double fuel consumption.

ThingDef.label: large bioengine Whithered
ThingDef.description: A nuclear-powered engine capable of launching a ship into orbit, at the cost of irradiating the surrounding area. Not suitable for interplanetary travel.\n\nProvides six times the speed of small engines.

ThingDef.label: sensor Whithered
ThingDef.description: Whithered for an organic sensor array.

ThingDef.label: small ship maw Whithered
ThingDef.description: Whithered for an small shipmaw.

ThingDef.label: corpse maw Whithered
ThingDef.description: Whithered for an small shipmaw.

ThingDef.label: small weapon Whithered
ThingDef.description: A Whithered from a which small weapon turret will grow.

ThingDef.label: medium weapon Whithered
ThingDef.description: The Whithered from which a medium turret will grow.

ThingDef.label: large weapon Whithered
ThingDef.description: Whithered for an small shipmaw.

ThingDef.label: fat store Whithered
ThingDef.description: Base for the growth a fat deposite.

ThingDef.label: fat store scaffold
ThingDef.description: Whithered fat deposite.

ThingDef.label: psi shield Whithered
ThingDef.description: The heart will convert this to a shield ganglia.

ThingDef.label: organic heatsink whithered
ThingDef.description: Whithered for a bio heatsink

ThingDef.label: organic heatsink Whithered
ThingDef.description: Whithered for a bio heatsink

ThingDef.label: whithered coolant cyst
ThingDef.description:
A cyst containing a reserve of coolant.

Heat capacity: 800Hu
Heat loss: 6Hu/s

ThingDef.label: whithered large coolant cyst
ThingDef.description:
A large cyst containg coolant. Slowly bleeds heat into the surrounding room if not in vacuum.

Heat capacity: 4000Hu
Heat loss: 18Hu/s

ThingDef.label: whithered thermal bile purge duct
ThingDef.description: Superheated bile is expelled through this duct, allowing the ship to rapidly cool itself. Shields will be dropped during a purge.

ThingDef.label: whithered large thermal bile purge duct
ThingDef.description: Superheated bile is expelled through this duct, allowing the ship to rapidly cool itself. Ejecting molten silver into space is a costly way to quickly purge stored heat. Shields will be dropped during a purge.

ThingDef.label: whithered giant mitochondria
ThingDef.description: A giant mitochondira, the powerhouse of the beast.

ThingDef.label: whithered colossal mitochondria
ThingDef.description: A whithered colossal mitochondira. Connect to a well fed heart to revitalize.

ThingDef.label: whithered spinal weapon root
ThingDef.description: Scaffold for the primary attachment point of a bioship spinal weapon.

ThingDef.label: whithered spinal coil
ThingDef.description: A middle segment of a spinal-mount weapon. Attach one or more of these to a root, then add a barrel to complete the gun.\n\nIncreases base damage by 25%, but also increases power consumption and heat generated by the same percentage.

ThingDef.label: whithered spinal weapon
ThingDef.description: The final segment of a spinal-mount weapon. Should be placed outside the ship, unless you want a new hole in your hull.

ThingDef.label: whithered capacitor
ThingDef.description: Efficiently stores up to 1,000Wd of energy.

ThingDef.label: whithered salvage maw
ThingDef.description: Harvests the remains of enemy ships after a battle. Each salvage bay can retrieve up to 1,000kg of material from a ship.

ThingDef.label: whithered haul beast eggsac
ThingDef.description: A cyst in which a haulbeast will gestate.

ThingDef.label: whithered haul beast eggsac cluster
ThingDef.description: A cyst in which a haulbeast will gestate.

ThingDef.label: whithered war beast eggsac
ThingDef.description: A cyst in which a war beast will gestate.

ThingDef.label: whithered vent
ThingDef.description: Exchanges heat with the coolant network, cooling or heating a ship's interior to the desired temperature.\n\nCan also heat rooms with electricity.
